mapper.select: select '三亚市' as name,sum(amount) as value from (select t.county,count(*) amount from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t group by t.county ) where county in ('崖州区','吉阳区','天涯区','海棠区')
select '海口市' as name,sum(amount) as value from (select t.county,count(*) amount from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t group by t.county ) where county in ('美兰区','琼山区','龙华区','秀英区')
select '南海诸岛' as name,sum(amount) as value from (select t.county,count(*) amount from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t group by t.county ) where county in ('西沙群岛','南沙群岛')

select t.county name,count(*) value from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t where t.county in ('五指山市','琼中黎族苗族自治县','临高县','乐东黎族自治县','儋州市','白沙黎族自治县' ,'保亭黎族自治县','琼海市','万宁市','屯昌县','文昌市','澄迈县','东方市','陵水黎族自治县','定安县','昌江黎族自治县') group by t.county
select t.county name,count(*) value from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t where t.county in ('龙华区','美兰区','秀英区','琼山区','崖州区','吉阳区','天涯区','海棠区','琼海市','儋州市') group by t.county
select property_nature as name,count(property_nature) as value from (select nvl(t.property_nature, '其他') property_nature from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t) group by property_nature
select substr(t.city,0,2) name,count(city) value from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t group by city
select t.if_operator_share name,count(t.if_operator_share) value from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t group by t.if_operator_share

select t.biz_scene name,count(t.biz_scene) value from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t group by t.biz_scene union (select '室分' as name,count(*) value from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t where t.biz_scene like '%室分%') order by name
select nvl(name, '未知') name, value from (select substr(t.delivery_time,0,4) name,count(*) value from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t group by substr(t.delivery_time,0,4) order by name)
select nvl(name, '未知') name, value from (select substr(t.delivery_time,0,7) name,count(*) value from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t group by substr(t.delivery_time,0,7) order by name)
select t.station_source name,count(1) value from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t group by t.station_source

select #{name} as name,1 - (select count(t.if_operator_share) from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t where t.if_operator_share = #{name})/ (select count(t.if_operator_share) from STATION_ADDRESS_MANAGEMENT t where t.if_operator_share like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%') ) as value from dual
select t.operator name,sum(site_equity_num) value from OPERATOR_STATION_INFO t group by operator
select t.county name,count(*) value from STATION5G_DEMAND t group by t.county order by value desc

select to_char(to_date(t.delivery_time,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm') name ,count(t.station_name) value from STATION5G_DEMAND t where t.delivery_time is not null group by to_char(to_date(t.delivery_time,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm') order by name
